name: El Nido Island Tour C
cancellation: Full refund is the tour is cancelled due to weather and cancellation is issued by the Philippine Coast Guard
Full refund if you cancel 7 days prior to tour date, otherwise your booking is forfeited and no refund will be issue.
desc: The beach culture of Palawan is rich in both natural beauty and local color. This unique tour will take you over the world-famous beaches of El Nido and to Matinloc Shrine. Your day begins with an early departure to El Nido Pier, where you'll travel to your first stop: Helicopter Island, which earned its name for its unique rock formations that give the island the appearance of a helicopter from a distance. It's time to visit Dilumacad and Matinloc, and you'll discover just why it was chosen as a location for the Hollywood film “Bourne Legacy”. You'll visit Matinloc Shrine, which is also known as the Shine of Our Lady of Matinloc, a spritual oasis. After learning the stories behind this location, you'll have a delicious barbecued lunch and then head off to the Secret Beach. Hidden away from the shoreline, it's like your own private paradise! Talisay Beach looks straight out of the movies and the Hidden Beach is an amazing, cove-like wonder fit for a fantasy novel. Don't miss out on the chance to see and swim in El Nido's finest beaches.
notations: 2 years old below free of Charge
7 years old above adult rate
Pickup Beyond El Nido Town Center & Corong corong area is subject to pickup charge. You may go at BPI Bank El Nido before 8:30am for your tour pickup
Big Lagoon slot is limited. In the event that no slot available, a replacement island. No need to pay Lagoon Fee
Drop Off is set to El Nido Beach
Itinerary may change without prior notice

9:20 AM Start of Tour
12:00 NN Buffet Lunch at the Island
4:00 PM end of tour
4:30 PM Drop Off at El Nido Beach
exclusions: El Nido Ecotourism Development Fee- P200/person
Hotel Pickup beyond El Nido Town Center

thumb.alt: El Nido Tour A with Small Lagoon

name: Honda Bay Island Tour
desc: Honda Bay is the place to be when looking for some fun in the sun, sand, and sea in Palawan. Get your day started bright and early, and head off for Luli Island. Play along the long, flag-decorated sandbar and dip your feet in the waves! Head for Cowrie Island for a picnic lunch, some fun watersports and more, from banana boats to kayaks. But the best is saved for lunch at Starfish Island where you might get to see hundreds of starfish just beneath the waves, littering the beach in the tide. This tour will give you the chance to play in the sun all day, go snorkeling and see beautiful underwater gardens! Play watersports, discover underwater wonders, make memories and more!
notations: 2 years old below free of Charge
7 years old above adult rate

desc: Experience Puerto Princesa Underground River Tour on your way back to Puerto Princesa from Port Barton. This tour starts at Port Barton and ends at Puerto Princesa.
itinerary: Pickup at Hotel in Port Barton
3 Hours Drive to Sabang Beach
Lunch at nearby restaurant.
30mins Boat Ride to Cave Entrance
Do the Puerto Princesa Undergrond River Tour
Travel to Puerto Princesa after the tour(2 hours drive)
Arrived in Puerto Princesa
Drop Off at Hotel in Puerto Princesa or PPS Airport
notation: Lunch, Tourguide Fees, Boat Fees & Wharfage, Cave Entry Permit is included in the package.
The Puerto Princesa City Ecotourism Development Fee(PHP150/person) is not yet included. Please pay directly to the tour guide by cash.
The boat in Sabang Wharf is managed by PPUR Park Management and not private boat. You will join other tourist on your way to the cave entrance.
